note.p: Bookseller and pigeon fancier. Secretary to the Office of the Charitable & Provident Society for the Aged & Infirm Deaf & Dumb. Bookseller and newsagent at 25 New Quebec Street, London. Pigeon fancier and member of the Philoperisteron Society.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1489/389/13), 1861 (RG9/25/152/31)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 3 June 2017)

note.term: Office of the Charitable & Provident Society for the Aged & Infirm Deaf & Dumb
